meanings.definition: Not able to be understood or interpreted.
meanings.sent1: The ancient writing was undecipherable to the archaeologists.
meanings.sent2: The doctor's handwriting was so undecipherable that the pharmacist couldn't read it.
meanings.sent3: The undecipherable map led the hikers in circles, much to their amusement.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were like an undecipherable code, impossible for anyone to crack.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious symbols on the stone tablet remained undecipherable despite many attempts.

meanings.definition: Impossible to decode or make sense of.
meanings.sent1: The encrypted message was undecipherable without the key.
meanings.sent2: The professor's handwriting on the board was undecipherable to the students.
meanings.sent3: The undecipherable jumble of wires left the electrician scratching his head.
meanings.sent4: The meaning behind her smile was as undecipherable as a secret code.
meanings.sent5: The strange symbols on the alien spacecraft were undecipherable to Earth scientists.
